
=== 1. stub1RuleA
    severity:  4 (Low)
    engine:    stubEngine1
    message:   This is a message
    locations:
        __PATH_TO_FILE_A__:20:1
        (main) __PATH_TO_FILE_Z__:2:1 This is a comment at Location 2
        __PATH_TO_FILE_A__:1:1 This is a comment at Location 3
    resources: https://example.com/stub1RuleA
